message.original: アークへ向かい消息を絶った 調査団の行方を追う
message.translation: Contact with the Arks' survey team was lost. Track their whereabouts

message.original: テル村近くに落ちたアーク内にて調査団を探す
message.translation: Look for the survey team of The Ark located near Tel village

message.original: 出現した敵を殲滅する
message.translation: Defeat the enemy that has appeared

message.original: 謁見の間へ戻り経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to the Audience Chamber
